title: en.wikipedia.org_wiki_Hima-Ten!
transformers_text: Him a Ten Japanese Hepburn Him aten is a Japanese manga series written and illustrated by Genki Ono j a The series began publication in Shueisha's Weekly Sh nen Jump magazine in July 2024 It has been compiled into five tank bon volumes as of September 2025 update The series follows Ten ichi Ie mori a 16 year old high school student who works part time as a house cleaner On his first day as a second year student Him ari Yoshino a popular model who owns a popular makeup line transfers to his school He then discovers that he was hired to clean Him ari's apartment on a regular basis as contrary to Him ari's public person a she is unable to keep her place clean Him a Ten is written and illustrated by Genki Ono j a who previously made the manga series Full Drive j a in 2017 It began serialization in Shueisha's Weekly Sh nen Jump magazine on July 8 2024 4 1 The series is also published in English on Manga Plus and Viz Media's website 5 The series ' first tank bon volume was released on November 1 2024 6 To promote the series three voice comics covering the first three chapters featuring Sh ichi r Umeda as Ten ichi and Mi ku It as Him ari respectively were posted on the officialS h nen Jump YouTube channel 2 3 The following chapters have not been collected into a tank bon volume yet They initially were published in Weekly Sh nen Jump The series has been nominated for the 11 th Next Manga Awards in the print category in 2025 13
